1.2.4: Add dark mode, use cases, and many optimizations.
1.2.3: Pull Addons and Help into the sidebar. Internal updates to Vue 3!
1.2.1: Scrub script/style tags from post content. Added import via file. Moved `identity.local` to `identity.addons.local` to clean up the data structure. Copy config is base64 encoded to avoid accidents.
1.2.0: Re-organized and renamed Addons, including the ability to use and re-use templates.
1.1.0: Re-skinned the entire project, fixed audio embeds, and set up the "smart" categories of Watch, Read, and Listen.
1.0.0: Initial build. Thanks to VueJS for all the hard work making a truly special framework geared for developer productivity!
